00021   RunTimeWhizard::RunTimeWhizard(std::string folder, std::string dbinit) {
00022     _folder = folder;
00023     _dbinit = dbinit;
00024    }
00025 
00026   RunTimeWhizard::RunTimeWhizard() : 
00027   _folder("/expert_cd_calice/CALDAQ_RunTimeInfo"), 
00028   _dbinit( DBInitString() ) 
00029   {}

00033   long64 RunTimeWhizard::getRunStartTime(int run){
00034     //Give an arbitrary Collection Name, needed by the inter face 
00035     std::string colName = "RunTimeCol";
00036      lccd::IConditionsHandler* conData = new lccd::DBCondHandler( _dbinit, _folder, colName, "" ) ;
00037      //Access the folder at the desired time stamp (note here we transform the
00038      //runnumber into a timestamp, we cheat a bit
00039      conData->update( static_cast<lccd::LCCDTimeStamp>(run));
00040      //Get the collection
00041      LCCollection* col = conData->currentCollection();
00042      //Obtain the time
00043      RunTimeInfo runtimeinfo(col->getElementAt(0));
00044      return runtimeinfo.getRunStartTime();
00045   }
00046 
00047 
00048   long64 RunTimeWhizard::getRunStopTime(int run){
00049     //Give an arbitrary Collection Name, needed by the inter face 
00050     std::string colName = "RunTimeCol";
00051      lccd::IConditionsHandler* conData = new lccd::DBCondHandler( _dbinit, _folder, colName, "" ) ;
00052      //Access the folder at the desired time stamp (note here we transform the
00053      //runnumber into a timestamp, we cheat a bit
00054      conData->update( static_cast<lccd::LCCDTimeStamp>(run) ) ;
00055      //Get the collection
00056      LCCollection* col = conData->currentCollection();
00057      //Obtain the time
00058      RunTimeInfo runtimeinfo(col->getElementAt(0));
00059      return runtimeinfo.getRunStopTime();
00060 
00061   }
00062 
00063 
00064   void RunTimeWhizard::print( int run,  std::ostream& os ){
00065 
00066   LCTime starttime(getRunStartTime(run));
00067   LCTime stoptime(getRunStopTime(run));
00068   os << " Starttime for run " << run << " is: " << starttime.getDateString() << std::endl;
00069   os << " Stoptime  for run " << run << " is: " << stoptime.getDateString() << std::endl;
00070   }
00071   
00072 }
